attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to save our planet & encourage people to use transport rather than 1 person in a car.
Why dont the government give help with the price of fuel to companies who run buses & minibuses to transport people to school & work to enable companies to be more competitive.
You only have to look outside every school in the country to see mothers & dads delivering one child to school in a Chelsea tractor.
The government should also provide free parking at the entrance to most motorways to encourage car sharing or regular minbuses to operate in & out of our cities.
Does no one else notice only me the ammount of cars with 1 person in going in & out of our cities.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
